content.text: 0) Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "the oven"@11:19 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@23:36 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@38:51 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) In a large bowl, cream together the butter, oil, brown sugar, and white sugar until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "cream"@20:25 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the butter"@35:45 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "oil"@47:50 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "brown sugar"@52:63 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "white sugar"@69:80 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until smooth"@81:93 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Beat in the eggs and vanilla.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Beat in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "the eggs"@11:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "vanilla"@24:31 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Combine the flour, baking soda, cream of tartar, and salt; stir into the creamed mixture.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Combine"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "the flour"@11:20 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "baking soda"@22:33 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "cream of tartar"@35:50 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "salt"@56:60 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "stir"@62:66 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "the creamed mixture"@72:91 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Mix in the chocolate chips and walnuts.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Mix in"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-10 "the chocolate chips"@10:29 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "walnuts"@34:41 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Drop dough by rounded teaspoons onto ungreased cookie sheets.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Drop"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( "dough"@8:13 / FOOD )
		:instrument ( tool-5-0 "rounded teaspoons"@17:34 / TOOL )
		:gol ( tool-5-1 "ungreased cookie sheets"@40:63 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until light brown.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:duration ( dur-6-0 "12 to 15 minutes"@12:28 / DUR )
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "the preheated oven"@32:50 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-6-0 "until light brown"@55:72 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Allow cookies to cool on the baking sheets for a couple of minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "cool"@20:24 / AC
		:ppt ( "cookies"@9:16 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-7-0 "the baking sheets"@28:45 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "a couple of minutes"@50:69 / DUR )
		:duration ( cond-7-0 "before transferring to wire racks to cool completely"@70:122 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
